name: Tots' Life
description:
Lo!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Tender Tumbling Tots of Totlandia are Tempted to begin their feast...

ALAS...

The Tenebrous Totalitarian Totborgs Turn up To Tell The Tiddly Tots:

"Hark! To Test Our Trundling Towers of Titillating Toasters, we must Take you and your Things To our subterranean Furnace!!!"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You (And A Friend): Are the Totborgs

Suck and Blow the Tots and Their Things into your glorious hole to help power the future of your Totborg brethren.

Best Played With Two Controllers.

( WASD & IJKL controls otherwise [ left shift/spacebar and right shift/enter to suck/blow ] )

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Download Tots' Sumo for Similar Tot FUn ; )
